name: stickboy (X_games) (X_games)
description:
STICKBOY is a hard pixel retro platformer. You play as STICKBOY. He is a boy whose hands and legs are sticks and he have to run, jump, get bonuses and shoot smart enemies in order to reach and destroy main boss.

 

CONTROLS

MOVING – ARROWS KEYS

SHOOTING – SPACE

M   –  GO TO MENU
